citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Protocol 2324-01 documents the number of dwarf hamsters necessary for use and the amount of animals that can be
observed annually, but does not provide a specific rationale for the appropriateness of this number. Failure to provide
rationale may compromise the ability of the IACUC to best assess the appropriateness of animal numbers. Proposals
must include this rationale for IACUC review.
Correct by May 20, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Protocol 2324-01 documents the number of dwarf hamsters necessary for use and the amount of animals that can be 
observed annually, but does not provide a specific rationale for the appropriateness of this number. Failure to provide 
rationale may compromise the ability of the IACUC to best assess the appropriateness of animal numbers. Proposals 
must include this rationale for IACUC review.  
 
Correct by May 20, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n

species.common: DJUNGARIAN / RUSSIAN WINTER WHITE DWARF HAMSTER
